entry.title: RT pbillingsby: There's many ways to interact with the Arweave network. One of the basic ways is using the HTTP API. Retrieving data from the network ...
entry.summary: RT pbillingsby There's many ways to interact with the Arweave network. One of the basic ways is using the HTTP API. Retrieving data from the network can usually be achieved in one line of code using tools like Axios/Fetch for JS, Guzzle for PHP. Here are some common endpoint interactions👇

entry.title: RT Fleek ⚡️: In an effort to supercharge our Non-Fungible Apps (NFAs), we’ve begun to integrate different web3 native protocols into the stack – s...
entry.summary: RT Fleek ⚡️ In an effort to supercharge our Non-Fungible Apps (NFAs), we’ve begun to integrate different web3 native protocols into the stack – starting with @graphprotocol! For info on how we integrated subgraphs into NFAs & a guide on deploying a subgraph in 2023: https://blog.fleek.co/posts/thegraph-and-nfas-deploying-subgraphs

community @ dd: 𝗪𝗘𝗟𝗟𝗡𝗘𝗦𝗦 𝗛𝗨𝗕 🍵 Every 2 weeks, beginning 𝟭𝟯𝘁𝗵 𝗙𝗲𝗯𝗿𝘂𝗮𝗿𝘆 — the Wellness Team will host a 60min support/guidance session in Discord: covering topics such as burnout, imposter syndrome, work-life balance, and more. Feel free to stop by 💚
